title: Print, "Pay Day in the Army of the Potomac", 1863
creditline: Gift of John Goldsmith Phillips, Jr.
description: The soldiers spending their pay, with three inserts showing them sending money home, getting their pay, two families receiving it.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Pay Day in the Army of the Potomac", 1863.
1863. Wood engraving

Support: Paper. Gift of John Goldsmith Phillips, Jr.. 1947-4-56.
